text:
Message 446 of 4024
Christina and I are in communication for plans this week as we always are.
I noted I am picking up boys tomorrow, Thursday and Friday. I have it covered.
Sent:01/16/2024 at 02:47 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/16/2024 at 02:47 PM)
Subject:Re: Adrian basketball/packages
Message 447 of 4024
Ok, last week you said I was not in pick up duty and I was. So sometimes things fall through the cracks or are miscommunicated. I was juts making
sure that it was not a repeat of last week.
Sent:01/16/2024 at 02:49 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/16/2024 at 02:49 PM)
Subject:Re: Adrian basketball/packages
Message 448 of 4024
In regards to furnace, it appears there is water dripping from under furnace or water heater. I have no idea where. I reached out to plumber to
schedule time to look. If that’s what furnace issue is let me know and I will cancel the plumber.
Sent:01/16/2024 at 02:52 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/16/2024 at 02:52 PM)
Subject:Re: Credit Card
Message 449 of 4024
I got an alert, the same one I got on Wednesday night. A blink camera was added to our home network at around 3:30 yesterday afternoon. So was
just asking what was up because the alert fired. That’s all.
Sent:01/16/2024 at 02:52 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/16/2024 at 02:54 PM)
Subject:Re: Cams
Message 450 of 4024
Should be totally unrelated. I’ll share the recommendation they made. We definitely don’t want to do it unless we reconcile and renew our vows.
Sent:01/16/2024 at 02:53 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/16/2024 at 02:54 PM)
Subject:Re: Credit Card
